definition: Sadr (name)/Moqtada Sadr (c. 1973-), Iraqi Shia clergyman and militia leader
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Sadr city (Shia township in East Bagdad)

sentences.english: I don't know how much power al-Sadr has.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道萨德尔能有多少力量。

sentences.english: But radical Shi'ite cleric Moqtada al-Sadr, is threatening to torpedo the vote.
sentences.chinese: 但是激进的什叶派教士萨德尔威胁要破坏议会的投票。

sentences.english: The Shiite leader Moqtada Sadr has called for a political solution.
sentences.chinese: 什叶派领导人萨德尔要求政治解决方案。

sentences.english: I made her a superlative horsewoman who rode sidesaddle to hounds.
sentences.chinese: 她是最高级女骑师骑着赛德萨德尔猎狗。
那么萨德尔到底想要什么？

sentences.english: This Iraqi Army security tower surveys the destroyed Jamila Market in Sadr City.
sentences.chinese: 伊军观察哨监视萨德尔城内被破坏的贾米拉市场。

sentences.english: Multiple explosions occurred in Sadr City, a Shi'ite neighborhood in Baghdad.
sentences.chinese: 巴格达什叶派聚居区萨德尔城发生多起爆炸。

sentences.english: Reed says he also doubts whether al-Sadr's order will have a lasting impact.
sentences.chinese: 里德说，他也怀疑萨德尔的命令是否会有持久的影响。

sentences.english: Mahdi Army militiamen are seen on the outskirts of Baghdad's Sadr City last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月马赫迪军的民兵在萨德尔城的郊外。

definition: Maliki or Al-Maliki (name)/Nouri Kamel al-Maliki (1950-) prime minister of Iraq from 2006

pinyin: Sa4 da2 mu3 · Hou2 sai4 yin1

definition: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad (1956-), Iranian fundamentalist politician, president of Iran 2005-2013/abbr. for 艾哈邁迪內賈德|艾哈迈迪内贾德
Khamenei, Ayatollah Aly (1939-), Supreme Leader of Iran, aka Ali Khamenei

pinyin: Ba1 le4 si1 tan3 Jie3 fang4 Zu3 zhi1
Yi1 si1 lan2 Sheng4 zhan4 Zu3 zhi1
